content.rendered:
INFINITY HOSPITALITY

NASHVILLE WEDDINGS, EVENTS, & DESIGN

INFINITY HOSPITALITY

NASHVILLE WEDDINGS, EVENTS, & DESIGN

REAL WEDDINGS

Kristen + Guido’s Romantic Flower-Filled Wedding

A flower-filled wedding reception full of romance at The Bell Tower.

Megan + Jorge’s Modern Mexican-American Wedding

A modern Mexican-American wedding at The Estate at Cherokee Dock.

Carley + Turner’s Modern Yet Timeless Wedding

A modern yet classic wedding with bold florals at The Bell Tower.

Load More

IDEAS & ADVICE

The Top Wedding Trends of 2024

From unconventional venues to rich color palettes, here’s a look at 2024 wedding trends.

How to Have an Eras-Inspired Wedding: Folklore Edition

Calling all Taylor Swift stans, here’s our take on how to have a Folklore Era-inspired wedding.

Answering Our Most Frequently Asked Questions

Commonly-asked wedding planning questions, answered.

Load More

SOCIAL GATHERINGS

A Chic Industrial Birthday Party at The Bridge Building

Looking back at a fun, stylish 60th birthday party at The Bridge Building.

A Miami Vice-Inspired After Party at The Bell Tower

A vibrant, tropical after party with Warner Music Group at The Bell Tower.

Planning the Perfect Rehearsal Dinner in Downtown Nashville

Our top five tips on how to plan the perfect rehearsal dinner.

Load More

CORPORATE EVENTS

Retro-Styled VIP Dinner With A Modern Twist

A black and gold VIP dinner experience for Vanderbilt guests at the Bridge Building.

Big Machine’s Speakeasy-Inspired CMA After Party at The Bell Tower

An after party for the CMA Awards full of vintage decor at The Bell Tower.

Baylor University’s Industrial Campaign Event at The Bell Tower

An industrial campaign event at The Bell Tower in Nashville for Baylor University by Infinity Hospitality.

Load More

excerpt.rendered: Baylor University’s president Linda A. Livingstone hosted the “Give Light” fundraising campaign at The Bell Tower with an industrial style, greenery decor, and loads of personal touches.  In the main space, a stage was set for live performances and stories by Baylor alumni, rising songwriter Trannie S. Anderson, CMA Chairman and songwriter Jim Beavers, and […]
